channel.title: Help please- still not fixed!
channel.description:
I used the tutorial: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457069.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457069.0.html[/url]
the problem i am having is declaring the two: [code]protected boolean hitUpdateRequired2 = false; protected int hitDiff2 = 0;[/code]
When I declare them I get this error: [code]Player.java:1422: illegal start of expression protected boolean hitUpdateRequired2 = false; ^ Player.java:1423: illegal start of expression protected int hitDiff2 = 0; ^ 2 errors Compiler Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
ALSO HOW DO I MAKE IT SO YOU HAVE A TIMER WHEN YOU LOG IN, SO YOU CAN'T TRADE AND CAN'T DROP ANYTHING OR CAN'T DIE FOR 15 MINUTES.

item.title: Help please- still not fixed!
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

I Vain I:

You don’t. You put them outside of a method.

Ok now its coming up:
Player.java:1380: cannot find symbol
symbol : method appendHitUpdate(stream)
location: class Player
appendHitUpdate(str);
^
1 error
Compiler Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

COULD YOU MAYBE TEAMVIEWER WITH ME BRO?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please- still not fixed!
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

I Vain I:

You added them inside another method, most likely.

I’m putting under the one it says to, why does it say illegal start of expression.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please- still not fixed!

item.description:

I used the tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457069.0.html

the problem i am having is declaring the two:

protected boolean hitUpdateRequired2 = false; protected int hitDiff2 = 0;

When I declare them I get this error:

Player.java:1422: illegal start of expression protected boolean hitUpdateRequired2 = false; ^ Player.java:1423: illegal start of expression protected int hitDiff2 = 0; ^ 2 errors Compiler Done! Press any key to continue . . .

ALSO HOW DO I MAKE IT SO YOU HAVE A TIMER WHEN YOU LOG IN, SO YOU CAN’T TRADE AND CAN’T DROP ANYTHING OR CAN’T DIE FOR 15 MINUTES.
